holidays.title: Eat Flexitarian Day
holidays.description: Flex·i·tar·i·an (noun): a style of eating that encourages eating mostly plant-based foods while allowing meat and other animal products in moderation.  Eat Flexitarian Day, celebrated on…

holidays.title: National Loving Day
holidays.description: We celebrate love and the Supreme Court's 1967 decision to strike down laws banning interracial marriage.

holidays.title: Brazilian Valentine's Day
holidays.description: Find out how Brazil’s culture has influenced a more intimate kind of Valentine's Day.

holidays.title: Chaco Armistice Day
holidays.description: Chaco Armistice Day is observed annually in Paraguay to commemorate the Chaco War against Bolivia.

holidays.title: Child Labor Day
holidays.description: Help us this World Day Against Child Labor to raise awareness about child labor.

holidays.title: Columbia Corpus Christi Holiday
holidays.description: Colombia Corpus Christi is a day to celebrate the body of Christ.

holidays.title: Democracy Day
holidays.description: Learn more about Nigeria’s pro-democracy movement and its ongoing struggles.

holidays.title: International Falafel Day
holidays.description: Let falafel be thy medicine and thy meal for the rest of the day.

holidays.title: National Button Battery Awareness Day
holidays.description: National Button Battery Awareness Day remembers baby Reese, who died from swallowing a button battery.

holidays.title: National Dane Day
holidays.description: Do you know someone named Dane? Give him a call and start celebrating his day!

holidays.title: National Esther Day
holidays.description: Do you know someone named Esther? Don't miss celebrating their special day.

holidays.title: National Jerky Day
holidays.description: Jerky is gaining popularity for the practical (and health) benefits of this meaty treat.

holidays.title: National Peanut Butter Cookie Day
holidays.description: Cookie lovers and peanut butter lovers unite to celebrate National Peanut Butter Cookie Day.

holidays.title: National Red Rose Day
holidays.description: Go out and smell the roses, as we bring a new bloom to this timeless flower.

holidays.title: Peace Day
holidays.description: Learn about the harrowing events that led to the independence of Kosovo.

holidays.title: Philippines Independence Day
holidays.description: The Philippines, with more than 7,000 islands in the western Pacific, has made great strides.

holidays.title: Pulse Night of Remembrance
holidays.description: Today, we remember the lives lost to a terrorist crime at the Orlando Pulse nightclub.

holidays.title: Raggedy Ann and Andy Day
holidays.description: While Raggedy Andy is popular, he never became as famous as Raggedy Ann!

holidays.title: Russia Day
holidays.description: Learn about Russia’s Independence Day, its new meaning, and what the citizens think of it.

holidays.title: Superman Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate and learn about everyone’s favorite Kryptonian!

holidays.title: White Nights Festival in St. Petersburg
holidays.description: Dive into one of Russia’s most significant cultural celebrations and learn about its history.

holidays.title: World Day Against Child Labour
holidays.description: Here's an in-depth view of the I.L.O.'s fight and its mission to abolish child labor.

holidays.title: Adriana Lima’s Birthday
holidays.description: This gorgeous model has achieved an enviable career and legacy through following her passion.

holidays.title: Anne Frank’s Birthday
holidays.description: The world will always celebrate the brave teenage girl who told her story simply but deeply.

holidays.title: Danny Gonzalez’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented YouTube star and musician’s successful career spans a decade already.

holidays.title: Dave Franco’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dave Franco is carving his own path in the world of entertainment.

holidays.title: Don Toliver’s Birthday
holidays.description: Toliver’s career, of course, is only beginning, and there’s much success ahead.
